name: Hello
description: Wave your hand with your palm facing outward. This is one of the most common signs and is universally recognized.

name: Thank You
description: Touch your chin or lips with the fingertips of your flat hand, then move your hand forward toward the person you're thanking.

name: Please
description: Rub your flat hand in a circular motion on your chest. This sign shows politeness and respect.

name: Sorry
description: Make a fist and rub it in a circular motion over your chest. This shows remorse or apology.

name: Yes
description: Make a fist and nod it up and down, like a head nodding 'yes'. This is simple and widely understood.

name: No
description: Extend your index and middle fingers, then snap them together like scissors. This represents rejection or negation.

name: Water
description: Form the letter 'W' with your dominant hand and bring it to your mouth, as if drinking. This mimics drinking water.

name: Food
description: Bring your fingertips together and tap them against your mouth a few times. This mimics eating.

name: Coffee
description: Mimic holding a cup with one hand and stirring with the other. This represents preparing coffee.

name: Banana
description: Mimic peeling a banana with both hands. Hold one hand as if holding a banana and use the other to peel it.

name: Apple
description: Make a fist with your hand and rotate it against your cheek, as if taking a bite from an apple.

name: Orange
description: Form a 'C' shape with your hand and squeeze it repeatedly, as if squeezing an orange.

name: Help
description: Place one flat hand on top of the other palm, then raise both hands up. This represents lifting or assisting.

name: Emergency
description: Cross your arms in front of your chest in an 'X' pattern, then thrust them outward. This signals urgency.

name: Doctor
description: Make a 'D' handshape and place it against your wrist, as if taking a pulse.

name: Happy
description: Place both flat hands on your chest and move them up in circles. This conveys joy or happiness.

name: Sad
description: Place both hands on your face and draw them downward. This mimics tears falling from your eyes.

name: Angry
description: Place both hands in front of your chest with fingers spread, then move them upward while closing your fingers. This conveys rising anger.

name: Love
description: Cross your arms over your chest, as if hugging yourself. This represents affection and love.

name: Friend
description: Hook your index fingers together, then reverse the position. This represents a bond between people.

name: Family
description: Form an 'F' handshape and make a circular motion around your face. This represents the unit of family.

name: Mother
description: Tap your thumb on your chin. This is derived from the sign for 'female' combined with 'parent'.

name: Father
description: Tap your thumb on your forehead. This is derived from the sign for 'male' combined with 'parent'.
